post_title: FS T206 and Related Cigarette Boxes
post_content:
I have a handful of duplicate boxes related to numerous card issues available for sale. Prices are below and include US shipping.  Please PM me to reserve.  Also, please just ask for more photos of any. Thanks. 

Ramly carton - $50
Pirate (full) - $100
Royal Bengal - $75
Tokio - $75
Mecca - $40
Helmar (1901 tax stamp) - $30
Richmond Straight Cut - $35
Jack Rose - $125
Old Mill (1909/10 tax stamp) - $550
Obak (1909 tax stamp) - $350
Obak (1915) - $150
Turkey Red (1909/10 tax stamp) - $250
Miners Extra (unopened) - $400
